### Chunk unknown — unknown

ile():
    # crude parse of "export VAR=value"
    with open(CONFIG_PATH) as cf:
        for line in cf:
            if line.startswith("export CHUNKS_DIR"):
                CHUNKS_DIR_DEFAULT = line.split("=", 1)[1].strip().strip('"')
                break
else:
    CHUNKS_DIR_DEFAULT = "./outputs/chunks"
